csw.services.command

Class CommandResponseManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • csw.services.command.CommandResponseManager

  • public class CommandResponseManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Wrapper API for interacting with Command Response Manager of a component

    param: commandResponseManagerActor the wrapped actor param: actorSystem actor system for managing stream resources inside

      • jSubscribe

        public csw.services.command.scaladsl.CommandResponseSubscription jSubscribe(Id runId,
                                                                            java.util.function.Consumer<CommandResponse> consumer)
        A helper method for Java to subscribe to the status of a command to receive the update in status
        Parameters:
        runId - command identifier of command
        consumer - consumer function to take action on the command response received
        Returns:
        a CommandResponseSubscription that can be used to unsubscribe

      • query

                                                      akka.util.Timeout timeout)
        Query the current status of a command

        timeout - timeout duration until which this operation is expected to wait for providing a value
        Returns:

      • subscribe

        public csw.services.command.scaladsl.CommandResponseSubscription subscribe(Id runId,
                                                                           scala.Function1<CommandResponse,scala.runtime.BoxedUnit> callback)
        Subscribe to the status of a command to receive the update in status

        Parameters:
        runId - command identifier of command
        callback - callback to take action on the command response received
        Returns:
        a CommandResponseSubscription to unsubscribe the subscription later

      • updateSubCommand

        public void updateSubCommand(Id subCommandId,
                             CommandResponse cmdStatus)
        Update the status of a sub-command which will infer the status of the parent command

        Parameters:
        subCommandId - command identifier of sub command
        cmdStatus - status of command as CommandResponse
